name: All Brave
description:
Warning!!
The Devil has been released from the seal!
The world will be destroyed after 9 seconds.
Brave, please save the world with friends!

In All brave, anyone could be brave. Braves would be your SNS friends(Facebook, twitter,etc)

Braves are summoned to your party while having the ability, skill and profession which are nonsense.

Make the party until the ridiculous stats will give us advantage that your friends laugh at!

Oh ... and the identity of the Devil, please try in the game.

We wish your friendship forever(really?) ...
